title.narrative: Societal Healing and Participatory Governance for Sustainable Peace in Rwanda

description.narrative: The project was implemented with a partner organization from 2015 to 2018. It was designed using an outcome mapping approach and it aimed at consoliding a peaceful and inclusive Rwandan society, enabled to overcome the wounds of the past and to peacefully manage conflicts and diversity.

title.narrative: Identité ethnique et cohésion sociale au Rwanda: Analyse critique des défis politiques et socioéconomiques

description.narrative: This research report by Interpeace local partner in Rwanda, the Institute of Research and Dialogue for Peace (IRDP), addresses the question of ethnic identity and social cohesion in Rwanda. It critically analyses the political and social challenges for social cohesion in Rwanda.

title.narrative: La participation citoyenne: Un des enjeux de la démocratie au Rwanda

description.narrative: This research report by Interpeace local partner in Rwanda, the Institute of Research and Dialogue for Peace (IRDP), addresses the lack of participation in decision-making as a weakness of Rwandan democracy.

title.narrative: Terre, identité, pouvoir et mouvements de population dans la région des Grands Lacs – Forum des parties prenantes régionales

description.narrative: Le “Forum régional des parties prenantes” constitue à la fois un mécanisme et une étape clé du processus de mise en œuvre de ce programme. Il valide les résultats des actions de rechercheaction participative (RAP) sur une problématique de recherche identifiée de manière inclusive.

title.narrative: Evaluation of the Rwanda peacebuilding programme (2001-2008)

description.narrative: This document presents the results of an external evaluation of the IRDP/Interpeace peacebuilding programme in Rwanda.

title.narrative: Evaluation of the Rwanda peacebuilding programme (2009-2011)

description.narrative: This report presents the results from an external evaluation of the fourth phase of the IRDP/Interpeace peacebuilding programme in Rwanda. The evaluation was carried out between mid-September and mid-October 2011.

title.narrative: La paix par le dialogue et l’education – credo commun à 7 organisations dans la région des Grands Lacs

description.narrative: Coverage of the Great Lakes programme Regional Stakeholders’ Forum in the Journal Indépendant d’Informations Générales.

title.narrative: International Day of Reflection on the 1994 Genocide of Tutsis in Rwanda

description.narrative: – Message from Scott M. Weber, Director-General of Interpeace

title.narrative: Integrating conflict prevention and peacebuilding into UN development assistance framework

description.narrative: This discussion paper reviews the nature of UNDAF, looks at some experiences in Rwanda and Sri Lanka that illustrate the problems presented above, and summarizes the essentials of effective conflict prevention and peacebuilding practice.
